General.Name: Companhia Energética de Brasília - CEB
General.Description: Companhia Energética de Brasília - CEB, through its subsidiaries, engages in the generation and distribution of electrical energy in Brazil. The company operates through Power Generation, Commercialization Of Electric Energy, and Others segments. It also produces electricity from hydropower projects; produces and distributes gas through pipelines; and provides maintenance and expansion services for the lighting system. The company was formerly known as Companhia de Eletricidade de Brasília and changed its name to Companhia Energética de Brasília " CEB in 1992. Companhia Energética de Brasília " CEB was incorporated in 1964 and is headquartered in Brasília, Brazil.
General.Address: SIA Public Services Area, Brasília, DF, Brazil, 71215-902
